channel.title: Exorium - Unique Features, stable enviroment, fun to play!
channel.description:
[CENTER][B]Exorium is a Brand new server and we hope you enjoy it![/B]
www.exorium.net/refer.php?=rsps
At Exorium our primary goal is to keep everything as realistic as possible. We offer you an amazing gameplay that you won't forget. That includes that there are no dupes/glitches/bugs at all and if we find any they are fixed immediatly. Even the minor details count if you are developing a minigame or something else, that's why we offer you perfection!
Perfect Summoning system [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mhJdPWz.png[/img]
Bank tabs working [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Upzozrx.png[/img]
Clan chat [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cQ8324R.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ITL51u7.png[/img]
[B]Unique features, short and to the point:[/B]
Fully working bank tabs, fast and without any duplication glitch Known because of our 'perfect' summoning. Perfect clanchat, lootshare integration. Perfect Castle Wars with collapsing, mining and catapults. 'perfect' Revenants in the wilderness with the working effect for the forinthry brace. Unique minigames such as the Blast Furnace minigame. Corporeal beast with working zamorakian spear. Awesome killstreak system, the higher your killstreak is the more pk points you get. Perfect combat triangle, accuracy, maximum hits, curses and clipping, 'perfect' Realistic skills, e.g. trees becoming stumps, rocks running out of resources. Perfect agility linked with running system and resting, 'perfect' Awesome lottery, saves all names and lottery size on restart. Many bosses, like the barrelchest twins, sea troll queen and much more! Outstanding economy which fulfills your needs Last but not least, almost no single bugs. [/CENTER]

item.title: Exorium - Unique Features, stable enviroment, fun to play!
item.dc:creator: @exorium exorium
item.description:
@exorium wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:8, topic:542542”][quote]
[Today 11:34 AM] Robby : by the way that downtime was caused by a small ddos attack
[/quote]

If you got knocked off by a small ddos attack, I definitely wouldn’t consider it stable.

Server is laggy at times, and your system updates seem to last about 15 minutes each time…

Apart from the above, looks good[/quote]

It been up for a week before that with no problems
ddos protection for us is too expensive atm

Read full topic

[CENTER][B]Exorium is a Brand new server and we hope you enjoy it![/B]

At Exorium our primary goal is to keep everything as realistic as possible. We offer you an amazing gameplay that you won’t forget. That includes that there are no dupes/glitches/bugs at all and if we find any they are fixed immediatly. Fully working bank tabs, fast and without any duplication glitch
Known because of our ‘perfect’ summoning.
